description: Number of partitions into a prime number of parts.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: with(numtheory):b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n<0, 0,      `if`(n=0 or i=1, 1, `if`(i<1, 0, b(n, i-1)+      `if`(i>n, 0, b(n-i, i)))))    end:a:= n-> `if`(n=0, 1, add((p-> b(n-p, p)           )(ithprime(i)), i=1..pi(n))):seq(a(n), n=0..60);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 24 2015
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 15 1999
